resp = client.esql.query(
    format="txt",
    query="\n    FROM semantic-embeddings METADATA _score \n    | WHERE content: \"How to avoid muscle soreness while running?\" \n    | SORT _score DESC \n    | LIMIT 1000 \n  ",
)
print(resp)
